enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve transforming based on a map, making them suitable for setting up similar test scenarios.
The constantTransformer method can be used to initialize the map with constant values, which is useful for predictable test setups.
The switchTransformer method can be invoked before switchMapTransformer to set up the predicates and transformers, ensuring the correct state for testing.
The invokerTransformer method can be used to create transformers that need to be invoked during the test setup, ensuring the map is correctly populated.
